title: Police Approve Torah Protest
body: Police in Yerushalayim give final approval for a massive protest against the draft decree, expected to draw hundreds of thousands to the city's entrance. The "Cry of Torah" rally is in defense of yeshiva bochurim.

title: Bobover Rebbe Votes in NYC
body: The Bobover Rebbe personally voted in the NYC mayoral elections, inspiring a massive turnout in the Bobover kehillah. The news was delivered through a community-wide phone message from askan Reb Yoel Rosenfeld.

title: Netanyahu Delays Draft Law
body: Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu requested a delay in Israel's draft law discussion, pushing the scheduled debate from Thursday to next Monday, citing a "special request".
